name: Message Chains (Law of Demeter Violation)
description: Detects long chains of method calls like a.getB().getC().getD().doSomething(). Message chains violate the Law of Demeter, creating tight coupling between classes and making code fragile to changes in intermediate objects. Use delegation or provide direct methods.

params.name: Maximum Chain Length
params.description: Maximum allowed method chain length before triggering the rule
